response.overview: Selection of transmissions from the eponymous pirate TV that operated in Rio de Janeiro between 1987 and 1990. Sequences captured from regular open television programming and other products from the audiovisual industry are arranged in an anarchic way, with new sounds created by the group, and edited together with testimonials despised by passers-by in the Rio de Janeiro capital. Irreverent document of the time, it reminds us of the popular frustration generated by the end of the process of "slow, gradual and safe" political "distension" proposed by the status quo from the 1970s in Brazil, by revealing the abyss between the image of past society by the big broadcasters and the perception of the people on the streets.
response.title: 3 Antena: Desobstruindo os Canal Tudo!
